name: Pre Hangover Quest
description:
You arrived in this bar with one vision, one purpose: to get completely shitfaced

You will meet fascinating people with complex and deep storylines (experience may vary depending on your actual level of alcohol)

Will you talk your way or just fight drunkards to reach your noble goal

Good luck and good drinks!

Sources:

game: https://github.com/ArthurRobein/Pre-Hangover-Quest

engine: https://github.com/cosmo-ray/yirl
